      • registerItem

        public SaleDTO registerItem​(int itemID,
                            int quantity)
                     throws IllegalArgumentException
        Register an item to the ongoing sale, if the item is unknown an exception of IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        itemID - Item to add onto the sale.
        quantity - How many of the item to add onto the sale.
        Returns:
        The state of the sale information after adding the item(s).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

      • registerPayment

        Register payment and end the sale.
        Parameters:
        saleState - Sale to register payment to.
        amountPaid - The paid amount.
        Returns:
        Information about the purchase
